testsuite.name: AppTestRunner.ExperiBankTestRunner
testsuite.system-out:
@login Scenario Outline: user login # src/test/resources/Features/EB1Login.feature:11 Given app apk is there # AppStepDefinition.EB1LoginStepDefs.appApkIsThere() When user enters 'company'and 'company' # AppStepDefinition.EB1LoginStepDefs.userEntersUsernameAndPass(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Ta Da!! Then user will navigate to home screen # AppStepDefinition.EB1LoginStepDefs.userWillNavigateToHomeScreen()
@makePayment Scenario Outline: # src/test/resources/Features/EB2MakePayment.feature:12 Given user clicks on thr make payment tab # AppStepDefinition.EB2MakePaymentStepDefs.userClicksOnThrMakePaymentTab() When user inserts '12345' and 'john' and '100' # AppStepDefinition.EB2MakePaymentStepDefs.userInsertsPhoneAndNameAndAmount(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And user selects country # AppStepDefinition.EB2MakePaymentStepDefs.userSelectsCountry() And user clicks on send payment button # AppStepDefinition.EB2MakePaymentStepDefs.userClicksOnSendPaymentButton() Then user closes the alert selecting ok and confirms payment # AppStepDefinition.EB2MakePaymentStepDefs.userClosesTheAlertSelectingOkAndConfirmsPayment()
